title: Take three (TEFC)
brief_description: The work of three secondary teachers and their drama classes is observed to provide the basis for discussion of the approaches to drama shown, and the methods of evaluation in the subject. Shows students in the 11-12 years age group, 15-16 years age group, and fourth year students in an optional drama course.
